edu.berkeley.path.beats.simulator
Class ScenarioElement

java.lang.Object
  edu.berkeley.path.beats.jaxb.ScenarioElement
      edu.berkeley.path.beats.simulator.ScenarioElement

public final class ScenarioElement
extends edu.berkeley.path.beats.jaxb.ScenarioElement

Container class for components used as targets or feedback in controllers and events.

This class provides a container for links, nodes, controllers, sensors, events, and signals that appear in the target or feedback list of controllers and events.
